basics.name: Trinh Hoang Lam
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: A Software engineer who works with the latest technologies and patterns comfortably both on the back-end and on the front end. Focus on product and company also, whatever is the best for the project. Open-minded, always willing to learn new things and facing challenges. Organizing and implementing workflows that fit best for the project and its goals.
